ygData.subject: Re: Battle at the Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: (TheCode, do you really have to whine every battle and make remarks that start arguments that have no importance?  My Maximals are fighting as well as they can

Subject: Re: Battle at the Cybertronian Fire

From: KSLawdogg@...

(TheCode, do you really have to whine every battle and make remarks that 
start arguments that have no importance?  My Maximals are fighting as well as 
they can and have done all that is possible to stop the Alliance.  Some of 
them were shot down and crash landed on the surface of the planet, so they 
aren't going to be at optimal fighting skill.  Stop whining like you do every 
fight unless you have something worth whining about) 


The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Beeline/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Firestarter/Unitron:


Dark One rolled, avoiding the shots.

"Slagging piece of slag..." he growled, firing off two energy-signature 
seeking missiles at Tarantopulous as the Oblitercon leader made his way 
towards IR and FZ.

---

Breakdown watched the Maximals lower there weapon, and then someone shot at 
Dark One.  He fired off two sonic arc blasts from his sonic blaster at 
Tarantopulous.

---

Pyro remained submerged in the mud, now six feet under, the pressure 
stopping.  But Pyro couldn't move.

---

Hiss fired off four fusion blasts from his cannon at Tarantopulous.  A blast 
of freezing struck his arm, the right shoulder joint freezing up and 
unmovable for now.

---

Scavenger transformed to his biped mode, running over to Pyro and plunging an 
arm into the mud, wrapping his arm around his comrade's wrist and tugging.

---

Hot Spot transformed to his biped mode, the blue robot turning around and 
making a run for Blades and First Aid, his sensors reporting First Aid near 
death.

---

Groove lowered his weapon, running after Hot Spot for Blades and First Aid.

---

Blades reached First Aid, putting pressure on First Aid's neck wound and 
chest wounds, blocking the flow of mech-fluid from those areas.

---

First Aid remained unconsciouss, slipping into darkness slowly.

---

Streetwise kept his stance, covering the other Protectobots in case of sudden 
attack.

===

Demon Wulf looked up to Iron Raptor, silently walking over to Future Zardus.  
The Vok warrior kept his sword pointed at the ground.  But he got a sensor 
lock on IR if she tried to run.  He would hunt his prey if the Maximal 
faction of the Cybertronians attempted anything.

---

Flesh Ripper lowered his rifle, transforming to his hyena mode and padding 
over next to Demon Wulf, transforming back to biped mode.

---

Dark Claw transformed to his beaten up attack vehicle mode, remaining where 
he was and arming his missile launchers just in case.

===

Beeline descended rapidly down towards the Alliance warriors.

---

Double Punch received FZ's transmission and had ordered everyone around him 
and the cyber-bee to stand down.  He held out a wrist, Beeline landing on it 
and attaching to it.

---

Manterror slowly got up, hearing the last bit of FZ's orders.  He made his 
way for Double Punch.

---

"We won this round.  But we'll win the next." he laughed, transforming to his 
badly damaged biped mode and landing on the ground next to FZ, stinger 
missile launchers in hand but missing missiles.

---

Bumblebee continued hovering in the air, his arms akimbo and the missile 
launchers pointed at the sky.  He looked at the carnage around the 
Cybertronian Fire and the damage caused to the CF, and wondered if the 
Maximals considered this a victory.

---

Sixshot transformed to his winged wolf creature mode, taking flight and 
preparing for the next attack.  He'd known Autobots as well as Maximals to be 
stupid.

---

Ares waited, weapons pointed at the ground.  Hopefully negotiations wouldn't 
work and he could get back to slaughtering Maxis.

---

Receiving a transmission from FZ, Sun Crusher raised an arm towards Reflector 
and pointed towards the CF.

The second-in-command of the Brotherhood powered up the boosters in his feet 
to full power and took off for the bridge of the CF.

---

Reflector nodded at Sun Crusher, tossing his rifle into subspace and heading 
for the CF as he flew through the air at full speed.

---

Minion stopped, sliding across the ground at the sudden stop while going over 
100 MPH.  He transformed while still moving, his biped mode crashing to the 
ground, the War Machine jumping up quickly, jogging for Chaos.

---

Chaos had four more missiles armed, but transformed to biped mode, a 
double-tubed rocket launcher in hand.  He lowered it, looking to Minion as he 
approached him.
"This may be interesting." he laughed, charging his optic weapons to full 
power if he needed to open fire quickly and take people down.

===

Nemesis was only a few meters from Blades and First Aid, but stopped his 
crawl when he saw two other Protectobots run over to their comrades.

"Slag...it." he coughed, looking up to see Scattershot land by him.

===

Vehement cursed at FZ's order.

-Cowards.  That Warrior of Light shall not survive-

He walked over to the opened part of the bridge, seeing Reflector and Sun 
Crusher heading for him.  The cannons on the ends of his arms took the forms 
of hands once more.

---

Unitron landed on his feet, rather happy with the deal FZ had made.  His 
plans hadn't been disrupted in the slightest.  It had in fact saved him 
trouble.

He nodded to Firestarter.  "Stand down.  We will get what we want either way."

---

Firestarter gave a crooked grin.  "Excellent.  I hope Shockwave fairs as well 
in his mission."
